KeyBERT: ['prohibits', 'prohibit', 'code laws', 'businesses regulation', 'laws', 'adult cabaret', 'regulation', 'amend south', 'sexually oriented', 'carolina code']
Representative_Docs: ['The purpose of this bill is to create the Sexually Oriented Businesses Regulation Act.', 'Enacting the community defense and human trafficking reduction act to regulate sexually oriented businesses and human trafficking and to impose criminal penalties.', 'Amend The South Carolina Code Of Laws By Adding Section 16-15-450 So As To Prohibit Adult Cabaret Performances On Public Property And In Places Where Such A Performance Can Be Viewed By Minors, And To Define Necessary Terms.']

Name: 0_drag_adult_adult cabaret_cabaret
KeyBERT: ['adult cabaret', 'cabaret performances', 'code laws', 'prohibits', 'cabaret', 'laws', 'drag performances', 'adult oriented', 'prohibit', 'location adult']
Representative_Docs: ['As introduced, requires a person to obtain a valid entertainer permit from the adult-oriented establishment board, in those jurisdictions with a board, prior to performing adult cabaret entertainment for compensation; prohibits public, private, and commercial establishments from allowing persons under the age of 18 to attend a performance featuring adult cabaret entertainment.', 'Establishes the offense of engaging in an adult cabaret performance or organizing or authorizing the viewing of an adult cabaret performance and the offense of organizing or authorizing the viewing of a drag queen story hour', 'Crimes and punishments; adult cabaret and drag performance; making certain acts unlawful; codification; emergency.']

Name: 1_businesses_oriented_oriented businesses_sexually oriented
KeyBERT: ['businesses regulation', 'sexually oriented', 'businesses', 'business', 'oriented businesses', 'adult oriented', 'oriented business', 'relating sexually', 'location adult', 'regulation']
Representative_Docs: ['Modifies provisions relating to sexually oriented businesses', 'Regulation of sexually oriented businesses.', 'Create new sections of KRS Chapter 231 to express the findings of the General Assembly relating to adult-oriented businesses and the need for regulation; define terms; establish distance parameters for the location of adult-oriented businesses in proximity to identified entities and locations; establish transition provisions for existing businesses; affirm the authority of local governmental units to supplement regulation of adult-oriented businesses.']
